analysis.description: Usdcoins.isNotContract (/unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol#199-213) is declared view but contains assembly code

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol:
	Contract Usdcoins has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol#69-70)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

icocontract.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol#266-276) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(owner,msg.sender,tokens) (/unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol)

Usdcoins.transferFrom.allowance (local variable @ /unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol#117) shadows:
	- Usdcoins.allowance (function @ /unique_chucks/46/0x47a0e3f58fe508c9ef78016fb4d52febed361e41.sol#195-198)
